translation.en: Tell him.
Yeah, I'm going to tell him.
Now.
Yeah, now.
I've been asking you to do this for months.
translation.es: Hace meses que te pido que le digas.

translation.en: Why don't men ever assign tasks to their wives?
translation.es: ¿Por qué el hombre nunca da tareas a su esposa?

translation.en: I'm not your wife, remember?
Technically, you are.
What's technically?
Well, if you're found dead under mysterious circumstances,
I will be the prime suspect.
Okay. You want me to tell an Indian male that he stinks?
translation.es: ¿Quieres que le diga a un indio que apesta?

translation.en: Keep it down, Shruti.
They understand English.
He just pretends.
All right, Arya.
If you don't tell him, I'm going to sack him without a reason.
translation.es: Si no le dices tú, lo despediré sin motivo.

translation.en: Technically, the car comes under my department.
You pay the EMI for the car, I pay for the drivers.
translation.es: Tú pagas el préstamo del auto, yo, los choferes.

translation.en: So technically he's my department.
translation.es: Así que, técnicamente, él me corresponde.

translation.en: Just tell him.
You know, a man has different smells in different parts of his body.
translation.es: Un hombre tiene distintos olores en cada parte del cuerpo.

translation.en: Which smell is exactly bothering you?
If his nose worked as well as his dick, we wouldn't be in this situation.
translation.es: Si la nariz le funcionara como la pija, no estaríamos así.

translation.en: When she has no comebacks she blabbers in Punjabi.
translation.es: Si no tiene respuesta, farfulla en punyabi.

translation.en: - What did you say? - What did you say?
- No, what did you say? - Nothing.
I ask you for so little, Arya.
That sounds like marriage.
That's a great list of books you have right there,
but I noticed you forgot to mention Arya Iyer.
translation.es: pero olvidaste mencionar a Arya Iyer.

translation.en: Arya who?
Arya Iyer, India's second highest selling novelist.
translation.es: Arya Iyer, el segundo novelista más vendido.

translation.en: After you, of course.
Yeah, I think one of his books did sell a few copies.
translation.es: Sí, creo que uno de sus libros vendió varias copias.

translation.en: But your question to me was books worth reading.
translation.es: Pero la pregunta fue qué libros valen la pena.

translation.en: So…
Okay, let's talk about your recent book.
translation.es: Bien, hablemos de tu último libro.

translation.en: Where's your investor?
He's at the bookstore. I think it's this way.
translation.es: En la librería, creo que es por aquí.

translation.en: I don't like him.
You've never even met him.
Yeah, but I know the type.
translation.es: Conozco a los tipos como él.

translation.en: The ones who make elaborate plans to surprise their wives
translation.es: Que buscan sorprender a su esposa

translation.en: only when others are watching.
You know, there are some sweet men in this world, Arya.
translation.es: Hay hombres tiernos en el mundo, Arya.

translation.en: Get used to it.
Actually, if you'd done those little things,
translation.es: De hecho, si hubieras hecho esas cosas,

translation.en: maybe you'd still have a marriage.
That's not what went wrong with our marriage.
translation.es: No fue por eso que nos fue mal.

translation.en: So what went wrong with our marriage, Arya?
That's what we're trying to figure out for the past three years.
translation.es: Es lo que buscamos saber hace tres años.

translation.en: Maybe nothing went wrong.
Maybe marriage is only for people with no other choice.
translation.es: Tal vez el matrimonio es para aquellos sin otra opción.

translation.en: Nobody else will have them so they're stuck together.
translation.es: No pueden estar con nadie más y se quedan juntos.

translation.en: Maybe we're too happening to be stuck in a never- ending marriage.
translation.es: Tal vez somos muy inquietos para un matrimonio eterno.

translation.en: So we live in the same house
to fool our daughter into thinking that her parents are together.
translation.es: para hacerle creer a nuestra hija que estamos juntos.

translation.en: How are we happening, Arya?
Well, we have a home. We have a beautiful daughter.
translation.es: Pues, tenemos una casa y una hija hermosa.

translation.en: Over a period of time, we've become good friends.
translation.es: Con el tiempo, nos volvimos buenos amigos.

translation.en: And who knows, we might even sleep together.
translation.es: Y tal vez hasta durmamos juntos.

translation.en: - Never. - Hey.
Never ever.
A couple never really knows when they've had sex for the very last time.
translation.es: Una pareja nunca sabe cuándo tuvieron sexo por última vez.

translation.en: - Look at you. - Ah.
- Such a lovely pair. -
There's so much love.
You know, I have this instinct for couples who have this magic still on.
translation.es: Por instinto reconozco las parejas en las que todavía hay magia.

translation.en: Wow. Your instincts are spot on, man.
- Everybody says that. - They do, huh?
- Arya, this is Mahesh. - Hi, Mahesh.
translation.es: - Arya, él es Mahesh. - Hola, Mahesh.

translation.en: Thank you so much for doing this.
I'm doing this for her.
I believe you're really important for her business.
translation.es: Eres muy importante para su negocio.

translation.en: Really important.
- Twenty five percent of her revenues. - Yes.
translation.es: - Veinticinco por ciento de sus ingresos. - Sí.

translation.en: I'm glad I'm doing it then.
Oh, my wife's a big fan of yours.
- She's read all your books. - How about you? Have you read any?
translation.es: - Leyó todos tus libros. - ¿Tú leíste alguno?

translation.en: - Um… - He's kidding.
So what are we doing? I have a flight to catch in an hour.
translation.es: ¿Qué hacemos? Tengo un avión en una hora.

translation.en: Yes, yes, so this is the plan.
translation.es: Sí, el plan es el siguiente.

translation.en: My wife's book club meeting is happening inside.
translation.es: Hoy es el grupo de lectura de mi esposa.

translation.en: There she is in green.
They're discussing your book and bam, surprise.
translation.es: Están hablando sobre tu libro, y ¡tarán! Sorpresa.

translation.en: You'll appear and wish her happy birthday.
translation.es: Llegas y le deseas feliz cumpleaños.

translation.en: Voilà.
- Let's do this. - Yeah.
How original.
The way he portrays his female characters, that's what I find amazing.
translation.es: CLUB DE LECTURA MUJERES TRABAJADORAS Es maravilloso cómo retrata a la mujer.

translation.en: And the way he describes the insides of an urban marriage.
translation.es: Y cómo describe la intimidad del matrimonio urbano.

translation.en: He's just so accurate.
Geeta, Geeta, hang on.
I thought we were discussing Amartya Sen.
translation.es: Creí que hablaríamos de Amartya Sen.

translation.en: Um, we wanted a break from the serious stuff, Dr. Basu.
translation.es: Quisimos una pausa de lo serio, Dr. Basu.

translation.en: Didn't you get an e- mail?
No, I didn't get any e- mail.
And in any case, your book club treats its male members
translation.es: Este club de lectura trata a los hombres

translation.en: as second class citizens even though they are feminists.
translation.es: como ciudadanos de segunda, aunque seamos feministas.

translation.en: Um, I'm so sorry about that, Dr. Basu.
Have you read this novel?
No, I don't read such books.
translation.es: No leo ese tipo de libros.

translation.en: Uh, Dr. Basu, please join us. Now you're already here.
translation.es: Quédese, Dr. Basu, ahora ya está aquí.

translation.en: - Sit. - Well…
- Hi, Golu. How are you? - Fine, Aunty.
Papa?
- Arya. - Hi, Geeta.
- - Happy birthday.
My God. Oh, my God!
Happy birthday, my darling.
- Happy birthday. Oh. -
Thank you.
- How do you do these things? - You like it?
Like it? I love it. I mean, this is the best surprise ever.
translation.es: Me encantó. Es la mejor sorpresa del mundo.

translation.en: Come here, give me a hug.
So how long have you been married?
- Twelve years. - Yes.
Wow. So what do you do for sex?
Anyway, it was really nice meeting y'all.
translation.es: Como sea, fue un placer conocerlos.

translation.en: Uh, and happy birthday again. I have a flight to catch.
translation.es: Y feliz cumpleaños. Debo ir a tomar un avión.

translation.en: What? No, you've just come.
We have so many questions for you, Arya.
- We can't let you leave. Please. - I'm in a little bit of a hurry.
No way. You have to stay here
and you have to read from your latest book.
translation.es: y leer algo de tu último libro.

translation.en: It's my birthday. Come on.
There we go.
Thousands and thousands of windows,
and behind every window is a shit marriage.
translation.es: y detrás de cada una, un matrimonio de mierda.

translation.en: And amongst these marriages, the worst kind are the ones that are stuck
translation.es: Y entre estos matrimonios, los peores son los que están atascados

translation.en: right in the middle of the shit scale.
translation.es: en el medio de la escala.

translation.en: No joy, yet not enough reason to break up.
translation.es: No son felices, pero no tienen razón para separarse.

translation.en: Therefore, some couples are much luckier than they think.
translation.es: Hay parejas que son más afortunadas de lo que creen.

translation.en: At least they have a good enough reason to end their misery.
translation.es: Al menos tienen una razón válida para poner fin a la pena.

translation.en: Is the passage over?
I guess now it is.
Are those my books?
Do you have a Nobel Prize in economics?
Thankfully not.
That won't be good for the business of a pulp fiction writer.
translation.es: No le serviría a un autor de literatura pulp.

translation.en: Well, then I'm afraid these are not your books.
translation.es: Entonces, me temo que no son tuyos.

translation.en: Don't I look familiar to you?
We're neighbors. We moved in only last month.
translation.es: Somos vecinos. Nos mudamos el mes pasado.

translation.en: Oh, hi. Sorry.
- Papa, I want to meet him. - Yeah…
Uh, he's my son, Gollu. Big fan.
translation.es: Este es mi hijo, Gollu. Gran admirador.

translation.en: - Hi, Gollu. - Go.
He's a fan.
Hi.
Uh, can you step out for a second, please?
What?
I don't shake the hand of teenage boys.
translation.es: No le estrecho la mano a los adolescentes.

translation.en: But why?
It's a policy.
Look, pardon me for saying this. I'm a political economist.
translation.es: Perdón por decir esto, soy economista político,

translation.en: I write policies every day. Never heard of such a policy.
translation.es: escribo normas a diario y esta no la conozco.

translation.en: Let's just say it's a phobia.
Why can't you shake the hand of a boy?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no puedes dar la mano?

translation.en: At this stage in their lives,
translation.es: A esta altura de su vida,

translation.en: uh, their hands are busy doing stuff, you know.
translation.es: usan las manos para hacer cosas.

translation.en: Which I don't have a problem with. That's fine. But, uh…
translation.es: No me parece mal ni nada, pero…

translation.en: they don't wash after.
But he's just 14.
Let's go, Ganesh.
Hey, do you even know where I'm going?
Fuck. It's come to this.
- Where are you going? - Mumbai.
What for?
- Now you're just faffing. - No, I really want to know.
translation.es: - Preguntas por preguntar. - No, quiero saber.

translation.en: Netflix wants to meet.
- They want the film rights of my latest. - Oh, wow. That's a big meeting.
translation.es: - Quieren los derechos del libro. - Es importante.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Don't let them jip you, okay?
You want me to negotiate?
I'll manage. Thank you.
- I'll see you in a couple of days. - Yeah.
translation.es: - Te veo en un par de días. - Sí.

translation.en: Hey, listen, listen.
I'm changing my Facebook status.
The relationship status.
I'm making it single.
Shruti, we had decided to keep it quiet till we know how Rohini is going to react.
translation.es: Decidimos ser discretos hasta saber cómo lo tomará Rohini.

translation.en: But it is all quiet. I mean, nobody's really going to notice.
translation.es: Estamos siendo discretos, nadie lo notará.

translation.en: Why are you doing it?
'Cause it's a first step, and I need a first step.
translation.es: Es un primer paso, y necesito este primer paso.

translation.en: When do you plan to do it?
Let's see.
Let's go, Ganesh.
- Hello. - Hello.
- What are you doing? - Checking your ticket.
- But why? - This is my duty.
How do you know this is not a fake ticket?
- Is it fake? - No, I'm saying…
Your seniors are just wasting your time.
- They made you wear this dress-- - Mister.
translation.es: - Te hacen usar un disfraz… - Señor.

translation.en: Does this look like a dress?
This is a uniform. We get it to serve the country.
translation.es: Es un uniforme que usamos para servir al país.

translation.en: No, you are serving the country,
but people in your village are thinking
translation.es: y los de tu pueblo piensan

translation.en: you're in this uniform fighting dangerous terrorists in Kashmir.
translation.es: que estás en uniforme luchando contra terroristas en Kashmir.

translation.en: But you're standing here and checking tickets.
Why are you insulting a soldier?
This guy's insulting a soldier.
No, I'm not insulting a soldier.
Get out of the line.
- What did I do? - Get out of the line.
Get out.
Gate number four. Gate number four.
Gate number four.
- - Notes from the field.
There's a man here who's looking at mobile screens trying to check tickets.
translation.es: Un tipo mira pantallas de teléfono intentando verificar boletos.

translation.en: He has no machine here that can validate the authenticity of those tickets.
translation.es: No tiene ninguna máquina que valide dichos boletos.

translation.en: But he's here doing a boring job.
translation.es: Pero aquí está, con su aburrida tarea.

translation.en: Hey! Hello.
Who are you calling boring? He's a soldier.
He's not from the army, you ignorant moron!
translation.es: No es del ejército, tonto ignorante.

translation.en: Hello, you, mister…
You better mind your language. I know what moron means.
translation.es: Cuide el lenguaje. Sé lo que significa tonto.

translation.en: And yet he doesn't have a problem with the word ignorant.
translation.es: Pero él no tiene problema con ignorante.

translation.en: If he's not from the army, is he from the navy?
translation.es: Si no es del ejército, ¿es de la Armada?

translation.en: Okay, tell me the full form of the CISF.
Don't act smart, you anti- national.
Okay. What language is our national anthem in?
- Sanskrit. - No.
- Hindi. - No.
Okay, Malayali.
And this moron thinks Malayali is a language.
translation.es: Y el tonto cree que el malayali es un idioma.

translation.en: You will not get entry from any gate.
Ma'am, please come here.
Ma'am, please come.
Ma'am.
Oh, there you are.
- I'm very sorry, sir. - It's all right.
We're trying to figure out what has happened.
Did you create some trouble?
I didn't create any trouble. I didn't say anything to anybody.
translation.es: No, ninguno. No le dije nada a nadie.

translation.en: In fact, my flight is in the next 40 minutes.
translation.es: De hecho, mi vuelo es en 40 minutos.

translation.en: Security has a major concern.
You can't fly to Mumbai today, sir. I'm sorry.
translation.es: No podrá volar a Mumbai hoy, señor. Lo siento.

translation.en: We're putting you on the No Fly List.
No Fly?
Ah, you haven't left?
My- my- my- my flight got canceled.
Oh. So now?
So you free for dinner?
Okay.
Hello.
Hello.
Hello.
Oh, hi. Are you from Mizoram?
- Meghalaya, sir. - Ah.
They put you up in this fancy dress costume
and pass you off as somebody from Vietnam.
- Are you okay with this? - Hmm.
- Yes, sir. - Does it not bother you at all?
- No, sir. - Just a wee bit?
Yes, a bit.
Welcome, sir.
Hello.
Sin, definitely it is.
Where's my wife?
Sir, she's there.
Oh, my God. Arya. I'm a big fan. Like, a big, big fan.
translation.es: Ay, Dios mío, Arya. Soy una gran admiradora.

translation.en: Oh. So do you work here?
Oh. No. I'm a professional photographer with Lifecatchers.
What's Lifecatchers?
Oh. You don't know Lifecatchers?
- Isn't that what I just said? - Sorry.
translation.es: - ¿No es lo que dije? - Lo siento.

translation.en: So we capture the most important moments of our clients' lives.
translation.es: Captamos los momentos más importantes de la vida de los clientes.

translation.en: - Wow. - What the fuck are you doing?
Am I paying you to chat?
Focus.
- That's our client. - A very pissed one apparently.
translation.es: - Ese es nuestro cliente. - Uno muy enfadado.

translation.en: Yeah, he's pretty nervous.
He's gonna propose to that woman.
translation.es: Le pedirá la mano a ella.

translation.en: He wants us to capture the moment when she finds the ring.
translation.es: Quiere que captemos cuando ella descubra el anillo.

translation.en: Hopefully she screams and cries.
And where's the ring?
It's going to be in the dessert.
Oh. How original.
So you need to act accordingly. You can't be in your comfort zone.
You will have to go out.
That's absolutely right.
You'll have to expand your horizon.
It's like we're in a world where beauty is often with the beast.
translation.es: Estamos en un mundo donde lo bello suele estar con la bestia.

translation.en: Hi.
Hey, thanks for the cushion.
Your back needs it more than mine.
That's very considerate.
Hey, Shruti. Do you see the couple behind me?
That man is going to propose to the lady tonight.
translation.es: El tipo le propondrá matrimonio esta noche.

translation.en: - She totally knows he's going to propose. - How do you know that?
translation.es: - Ella sabe que lo hará. - ¿Cómo lo sabes?

translation.en: Look at her.
Every fucking thing about her says he's going to get sex
translation.es: Cada partícula de ella dice que le dará sexo

translation.en: every single night.
Food and sex and food and sex.
translation.es: Comida y sexo y comida y sexo.

translation.en: And that's going to be the story of their lives.
translation.es: Y esa será la historia de su vida.

translation.en: Hello. You're making it very obvious.
Yeah, well, what do I care?
I don't like guys like him in the first place,
translation.es: No me caen bien los tipos así,

translation.en: who make this grand gesture of proposing.
You know, it's never about the girl. It's all about themselves.
translation.es: Lo hacen más por ellos que por la mujer.

translation.en: Oh, look. Such a nice guy I am.
I'm spending so much money on this moment and this is how much I loved her.
translation.es: Estoy gastando mucho en esto porque la amo tanto.

translation.en: Bullshit.
You know, when I was his age,
most of the girls I was interested in didn't even know that.
translation.es: la mayoría de las chicas que me interesaban no lo sabían.

translation.en: I know.
No, seriously. My generation was never about the show.
translation.es: De veras, mi generación no era de alardear.

translation.en: We spent hours and hours trying to get the girl, get this, happy.
translation.es: Estábamos horas tratando de que la chica estuviera feliz.

translation.en: No, seriously. Look…
No, seriously. Look…
Son of a bitch.
Hey, um…
Can you order? I'll just be back.
- Uh, what do you… What? - The usual.
Why are you standing? Sit down.
This is the bathroom.
Okay, okay.
Hi.
Hi.
Sir, one moment.
- Hey. - Hi.
You too write well.
But you use difficult words like furtive and…
translation.es: Pero usas palabras difíciles como furtivo o…

translation.en: - Inadequate? - Uh…
- All the best. - My apologies.
So how have you been?
I've been good. What's up with you?
All good. Uh, Netflix may be buying my books. Maybe all of them.
translation.es: Bien, Netflix quiere comprar mis libros. Tal vez todos.

translation.en: - Nice. - How about you?
They can't afford me.
Hey, so I have an outrageous request.
I'm here with my wife for dinner,
and I was wondering if you could come over to my table
translation.es: ¿crees que podrías venir a la mesa

translation.en: and say something.
Something fan- like, so I can get some brownie points with my wife.
translation.es: Puedes fingir que me admiras, así anoto unos puntos.

translation.en: That's sweet. Yeah, I'll do it.
Oh, you'll do it?
Yeah, such a small thing.
You run along, I'll join you guys.
That's very kind of you. Thank you.
translation.es: Muy amable de tu parte, gracias.

translation.en: - So I'll see you around. - Yeah, see you around.
- Chetan? - Yes?
- Oh. Selfie? Huh. - Check this.
This guy is insulting a soldier.
They made you wear this dress--
Mister! You think this is a dress?
This is a uniform. We get it to serve the country.
translation.es: Es un uniforme que usamos para servir al país.

translation.en: No, you are serving the country.
translation.es: No, tú estás sirviendo al país.

translation.en: In India, we should have compulsory military training.
translation.es: En India, debería haber instrucción militar obligatoria.

translation.en: - Just like the Israelis. - Exactly.
I say the same thing to my friends, but they laugh at me.
translation.es: Eso les digo a mis amigos, pero se ríen de mí.

translation.en: He is absolutely correct.
The middle class in this country these days
translation.es: Hoy, la clase media de este país

translation.en: is so anti- intellectual.
Semi- literates.
Semi- literates.
Hey, so what did I miss?
She just cried.
Oh, shit. That mean they're gonna cancel the dessert?
No. It's a happy cry.
Vicky, life is just so perfect in this moment.
translation.es: Vicky, la vida es perfecta en este instante.

translation.en: Vicky, I could die in your arms.
I could die in your arms tonight.
translation.es: Podría morir en tus brazos esta noche.

translation.en: Kind of a thing.
Two coconut chocolate ice creams, please.
translation.es: Dos helados de chocolate y coco.

translation.en: And the moment has arrived.
Just check out the size of this table.
translation.es: Mira el tamaño de la mesa.

translation.en: Where the hell is he going to keep the food?
- On top of that, this huge flower-- - Let them be. They're pretty.
translation.es: - Además, esta flor… - Déjala, es bonita.

translation.en: You know why women like flowers?
translation.es: ¿Sabes por qué les gustan las flores a las mujeres?

translation.en: Why?
Because flowers are vaginas.
Then you should like them, no?
- See the bees-- - Arya?
Oh, man, I read your book. It was so good.
translation.es: Leí tu libro, me pareció genial.

translation.en: So good to see you here, man.
One selfie, you and me?
What are you doing, Chetan?
Where are your manners?
Where's your decency, man?
I'm having a private moment with my wife.
translation.es: Es un momento íntimo con mi esposa.

translation.en: Can we do this later, please?
Run along. Go on.
Some people just don't get it.
What the fuck was that, Arya?
- Why? - What just happened?
What got into you?
I wanna have a private time with you.
translation.es: Quiero un momento con mi esposa.

translation.en: This is important for me.
- Oh. Since when? -
Come on. It's always meant a great deal to me.
What's wrong with you, Shruti? I'm so offended.
Oh, shit!
Hey…
What are you guys doing? What are you doing?
Hey, boss, we came here for a quiet dinner.
- Not to see some guy do his peacock dance. - Arya--
translation.es: No ver la danza de un pavo real.

translation.en: No, seriously. And you know what?
The worst part is, this is not even about you.
translation.es: Todo esto ni siquiera es por ti.

translation.en: It's about how cute he is.
It's phoney guys like him who have ruined the lives of honest men
translation.es: Los falsos como él son la ruina de los tipos honestos

translation.en: who don't want to do shit like this.
translation.es: que no quieren hacer estas cosas.

translation.en: You are one asshole fellow!
He ruined the proposal.
My little brother was working on this for a whole week.
translation.es: Mi hermano lo planeó una semana.

translation.en: You brought your entire family to watch this drama?
translation.es: ¿Trajiste a tu familia a ver este drama?

translation.en: - He brought his-- - Arya, please.
He is my brother and nephew.
translation.es: Es mi hermano y mi sobrino.

translation.en: Oh, how considerate. I know people like you.
translation.es: Qué considerado. Conozco tipos como tú.

translation.en: You're the kind of guy who will take his parents to the honeymoon.
translation.es: Eres de los que llevarían a sus padres a la luna de miel.

translation.en: - You sure you want to marry this buffoon? - Sir…
- Yes. - You're disturbing everyone.
I'm disturbing everyone?
Have you seen these grown men in costumes?
Sir, this is their job. This is what they do.
translation.es: Señor, es su trabajo. Es lo que hacen.

translation.en: I'm not talking about their jobs.
But why'd you have to make them look like fools?
Whom are you calling fools? We are just playing our set.
translation.es: ¿A quién le dice idiotas? Solo estamos tocando.

translation.en: Not you, brother. I'm saying he's making you look like--
translation.es: Tú no, viejo. Digo que él los hace vestir…

translation.en: - Sir, we'll take full payment for this. - You should--
Harry!
He spoiled my moment.
He is a traitor!
- Fucker! - Hold his hand.
Hey, hold on.
Come on, Professor. These types of people behave better after two slaps.
translation.es: Vamos, profesor. Con una bofetada se resuelve todo.

translation.en: No, Mr. Singh.
We are from Gandhi's country.
Violence is wrong.
Wait, wait, wait. Uh…
Let the youngest amongst you reach out to this man for peace.
translation.es: Que los más jóvenes de ustedes intenten hacer las paces con este hombre.

translation.en: - What's your name, dear? - Satvinder.
Yes, Satvinder.
Give your hand to Uncle.
Shake his hand, dear.
Shake it.
What are you waiting for? Shake his hand.
At this stage in their lives, they're hands are busy doing stuff.
translation.es: A esta altura de su vida, usan las manos para hacer cosas.

translation.en: Arya, shake his hand.
Come on, man. Shake his hand.
They don't wash after.
What are you looking at? Shake his hand.
Come on, man. Shake his hand.
